column3: Sorry, but I must go. I have to be home {{c1::by}} five o'clock.
The office closes early today. It's only open {{c1::until}} 4 o'clock.
I need to pay the phone bill. It has to be paid {{c1::by}} tomorrow.
Don't pay the bill today. Wait {{c1::until}} tomorrow.
I'm still waiting for Tom to call me. He should have called me {{c1::by}} now.
We hope to finish painting the house {{c1::by}} the end of the week.
I'm staying with a friend {{c1::until}} I find somewhere to live.
I don't know whether to apply for the job or not. I have to decide {{c1::by}} Friday.
We have plenty of time. The film doesn't start {{c1::until}} 8.30.
According to the forecast, the bad weather will continue {{c1::until}} next week.
